text: Data from deep sequencing of a Ph-negative clone of a Ph-positive CML patient has found a driving mutation in DNMT3A that preceeded the BCR-ABL fusion, and may imply the possibility that BCR-ABL is not universally the initiating event in CML.
citation: Schmidt et al., 2014, Leukemia

text: The presence of BCR-ABL fusion is considered the characterizing feature of chronic myeloid leukemia, and has been widely thought of as the initiating event in the disease.
citation: An et al., 2010, Leuk. Res.

text: The use of second-generation BCR-ABL targeted therapies has been effective in patients resistant to imatinib.
citation: An et al., 2010, Leuk. Res.

text: COS7 cell lines transfected with BCR/ABL constructs harboring E255K mutations were shown to be resistant to imatinib and exhibited increased kinase activity.
citation: Yamamoto et al., 2004, Biochem. Biophys. Res. Commun.

text: COS7 cell lines transfected with BCR/ABL constructs harboring T315I mutations were shown to be resistant to imatinib and exhibited increased kinase activity.
citation: Yamamoto et al., 2004, Biochem. Biophys. Res. Commun.

text: In chronic myeloid leukemia patients with the ABL T315I mutation, tumors have shown to be resistant to imatinib treatment.
citation: An et al., 2010, Leuk. Res.

text: PIK3CA mutation, but not AKT1 E17K, has been shown to confer sensitiity to the AKT inhibitor MK-2206 in breast cancer cell lines.
citation: Beaver et al., 2013, Clin. Cancer Res.

text: In patients with non-small cell lung cancer harboring the EML4-ALK fusion, treatment with crizotinib has shown to be effective in acheiving stable disease.
citation: Choi et al., 2010, N. Engl. J. Med.

text: In patients with non-small cell lung cancer harboring EML4-ALK fusion, the C1156Y variant has been shown to confer resistance to crizotinib.
citation: Choi et al., 2010, N. Engl. J. Med.

text: CH5424802 treatment resulted in significant tumor regression in xenograft models produced from Ba/F3 cells expressing EML4-ALK or AML4-ALK with the L1196M mutation
citation: Sakamoto et al., 2011, Cancer Cell

text: In patients with non-small cell lung cancer harboring EML4-ALK fusion, the L1196M variant has been shown to confer resistance to crizotinib.
citation: Choi et al., 2010, N. Engl. J. Med.

text: Ba/F3 cells expressing the RANBP2-ALK fusion containing an F1174L mutation were more resistant to crizotinib treatment than Ba/F3 cells expressing RANBP2-ALK without this mutation.
citation: Sasaki et al., 2010, Cancer Res.

text: CH5424802 is effective in inhibiting the activity of the F1174L ALK mutant in a kinase activity assay and proliferation assay using neuroblastoma KELLY cells.
citation: Sakamoto et al., 2011, Cancer Cell

text: Cells lines expressing ALK harboring the F1174L mutation are less sensitive to growth inhibition by crizotinib than cells expressing the R1275Q mutation.
citation: Bresler et al., 2011, Sci Transl Med

text: High levels of crizotinib can overcome drug resistance of Ba/F3 cells expressing the EML4-ALK fusion containing the F1174L mutation.
citation: Heuckmann et al., 2011, Clin. Cancer Res.

text: SH-SY5Y and Kelly cells with mutant ALK (F1174L) and Ba/F3 cells overexpressing ALK harboring the F1174L mutation are sensitive to TAE684-mediated growth inhibition
citation: George et al., 2008, Nature

text: Ba/F3 cells expressing the EML4-ALK fusion containing an F1174L mutation were more resistant to crizotinib treatment than Ba/F3 cells expressing EML4-ALK without this mutation.
citation: Sasaki et al., 2010, Cancer Res.

text: Cells lines expressing ALK harboring the F1174L mutation are less sensitive to growth inhibition by crizotinib than cells expressing the R1275Q mutation
citation: Bresler et al., 2011, Sci Transl Med

text: TAE684 inhibits growth of Ba/F3 cells expressing ALK mutations; however, cells with the R1275Q mutation were inhibited at a higher IC50 than those expressing F1174L.
citation: George et al., 2008, Nature

text: The SMS-KCNR cell line harboring the R1275Q mutation was resistant to TAE684.
citation: George et al., 2008, Nature

text: In one patient with S214C mutation, the use of sorafenib has led to more than 5 years of survival and near remission.
citation: Imielinski et al., 2014, J. Clin. Invest.

text: Sorafenib can inhibit ARF-mediated MEK phosphorylation and soft agar colony formation of AALE cells expressing ARAF S214C in vitro
citation: Imielinski et al., 2014, J. Clin. Invest.

text: Trametinib can inhibit ARF-mediated ERK phosphorylation and soft agar colony formation of AALE cells expressing ARAF S214C in vitro
citation: Imielinski et al., 2014, J. Clin. Invest.

text: In metastatic colorectal cancer patients with wildtype KRAS, BRAF mutations were associated with poor progression free survival regardless of treatment (panitumumab with best supportive care or best supportive care alone)
citation: Peeters et al., 2013, Clin. Cancer Res.

text: Melanoma patients with BRAF V600E/K mutations had longer progression-free survival, increased tumor regression,  and increased duration of response to combined dabrafenib and trametinib treatment compared to dabrafenib alone
citation: Flaherty et al., 2012, N. Engl. J. Med.
